item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 7: Using Joins to Combine and Unify Data
item.description: Joins allow you to combine data from multiple tables. Learn how can it be the foundational of recommendations and collaborative filtering as it enables us to find patterns, associations, and similarities within datasets.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 6: Elevating Data Presentation - Advanced Sorting Techniques for Deeper Insights
item.description: This chapter delves into multi-level sorting, sorting based on computed columns, and handling case-insensitive or locale-specific requirements. You'll explore practical examples and detailed explanations to master these techniques, enabling you to handle complex data sets and present results that provide deeper insights and support decision-making. Start by learning how to perform multi-level sorting for effective data prioritization and organization.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 5: Advanced SQL Filtering - How to Refine Your Queries for Better Data Insights
item.description: This chapter covers intricate WHERE conditions, pattern matching, range filtering, and null checking, providing clear examples and explanations. Learn to leverage SQL's powerful capabilities for managing and analyzing data.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Summary Sheet / Cheat Sheet
item.description: This comprehensive summary sheet / cheat sheet covers from basic `SELECT` statements to advanced joins, subqueries, and query optimization.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: The Future of Web Apps — "Offline-First" and "Peer-to-Peer" Design
item.description: As the web continues to evolve, developers are seeking new ways to enhance the performance, privacy, and resilience of web applications. Two paradigms emerging in this area are "offline-first" and "peer-to-peer" (P2P) designs.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: The Secrets of Cloud Services — Avoid Hidden Traps and Maximize Benefits
item.description: The secret of cloud services. Before you use it, there are some things you should know. How can you maximize the benefits of using the cloud?
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Understanding JavaScript Variable Definitions and Block Scope
item.description: Discover the differences between `var`, `let`, and `const` in JavaScript. Learn how variable scoping works, why `let` and `const` are preferred, and the dangers of creating global variables unintentionally. Master the basics of variable declaration for cleaner, more predictable code.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Why Your Website Is Not Accepted by Google AdSense?
item.description: Getting approved for Google AdSense can be puzzling, especially when you’ve put so much effort into your website. If you’ve been rejected, it’s frustrating—but it’s also an opportunity to understand what went wrong and how to fix it. Here are some common reasons why your site might not have made the cut.
item.dc:creator: Otra Suinegue
